description: Creates or updates partition statistics of columns. The Identity and Access Management (IAM) permission required for this operation is UpdatePartition.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the catalog database where the partitions reside.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The name of the partitions' table.

parameters.name: PartitionValues
parameters.description: A list of partition values identifying the partition. (string) ---

parameters.name: ColumnStatisticsList
parameters.description: A list of the column statistics. (dict) --- Represents the generated column-level statistics for a table or partition. Name of column which statistics belong to. The data type of the column. The timestamp of when column statistics were generated. A ColumnStatisticData object that contains the statistics data values. The type of column statistics data. BooleanColumnStatisticsData (dict) --- Boolean column statistics data. The number of true values in the column. The number of false values in the column. The number of null values in the column. DateColumnStatisticsData (dict) --- Date column statistics data. MinimumValue (datetime) --- The lowest value in the column. MaximumValue (datetime) --- The highest value in the column. The number of distinct values in a column. DecimalColumnStatisticsData (dict) --- Decimal column statistics data. UnscaledValues within are Base64-encoded binary objects storing big-endian, two's complement representations of the decimal's unscaled value. MinimumValue (dict) --- The lowest value in the column. The unscaled numeric value. The scale that determines where the decimal point falls in the unscaled value. MaximumValue (dict) --- The highest value in the column. DoubleColumnStatisticsData (dict) --- Double column statistics data. MinimumValue (float) --- The lowest value in the column. MaximumValue (float) --- The highest value in the column. LongColumnStatisticsData (dict) --- Long column statistics data. MinimumValue (integer) --- The lowest value in the column. MaximumValue (integer) --- The highest value in the column. StringColumnStatisticsData (dict) --- String column statistics data. The size of the longest string in the column. The average string length in the column. BinaryColumnStatisticsData (dict) --- Binary column statistics data. The size of the longest bit sequence in the column. The average bit sequence length in the column. The number of null values in the column.
